**AI Sidenote: Smart Summarization & Extraction**

  

AI Sidenote is a minimalistic and efficient Chrome extension designed to help you stay focused while reading. It allows you to quickly extract content from web pages and provides real-time AI-powered summaries and explanations. With support for OpenAI, Anthropic, and Google models, AI Sidenote gives you the flexibility to tailor the AI’s output to meet your specific needs.

  

**Key Features:**

  

• **Web Content Extraction**: Easily highlight and save important information from any webpage.

• **AI Summarization & Explanation**: Generate intelligent summaries or explanations by creating **custom prompts** that allow you to guide the AI in producing exactly the information you need.

• **Export Content**: Quickly export your notes for easy sharing and management.

• **Custom Prompts**: Take control of the AI’s output by personalizing prompts, enabling you to accomplish tasks and retrieve precisely the information you’re looking for.

• **Model Selection**: Choose between advanced AI models from OpenAI, Anthropic, or Google to suit your preferences.

  

With a **Minimal Design**, AI Sidenote is simple and intuitive to use, keeping you focused without distractions. The **local first** design ensures that your data is primarily stored locally, safeguarding your privacy and security.

  

Designed for users who value efficiency and customization, install AI Sidenote now to enhance your reading and information management experience!
